subject: help
description_text:
hello,
i wrote to you from aliexpress too but since I bought the pedals pro x,
I've been slowly buying the other equipment, yesterday I installed them in
the cockpit and I noticed something. You didn't send me this plate. When I
bought the pedals + plate, I paid accordingly. Did you scam me?!

conversations.body_text: Hi Mert Duyar,  Please provide your AliExpress order number so I can check it for you. If there was indeed a missing item, we will definitely send it to you — we would never try to deceive you, so please rest assured.

3056258081755483
Since there was a big discount + discount coupon, I chose and bought the
option with both pedals and plate, but there is only pedal

25 Tem 2025 Cum, saat 03:52 tarihinde service@simsonn.com <
service@simsonn.com> şunu yazdı:

> Hi Mert Duyar,
>
> Please provide your AliExpress order number so I can check it for you.
> If there was indeed a missing item, we will definitely send it to you — we
> would never try to deceive you, so please rest assured.
>
>
>
Hi Mert Duyar,     Our sales team has checked your order and found that you didn’t purchase a baseplate.

Howw???? I'm sure I added it. How can that be?

service@simsonn.com

There is no need to waste time discussing this right now, it would be
better to find a solution. Would you like to help me with any discount
coupons to buy this plate or I will have to return these pedals.

Mert Duyar <mertduyar16@gmail.com>, 25 Tem 2025 Cum, 11:02 tarihinde şunu
yazdı:

> Howw???? I'm sure I added it. How can that be?
>
> service@simsonn.com
Hi Mert Duyar,  You can check your order on AliExpress, and I have confirmed that it does not include a baseplate.
Hi Mert Duyar,  This is not our responsibility as we shipped exactly according to the order and did not send the wrong items. We cannot agree to such an unreasonable request.
Hi Mert Duyar,  What we can do is provide you with a $10 coupon, which you can claim and use.

This is my cockpit. Will the plate fit this cockpit? And the brand I bought
the cockpit from sells the same pallet for 50 euros. Is there any chance
you can give me a little discount?
[image: image.png]

service@simsonn.com

and does it have all the necessary screws etc. or just the plate?

Mert Duyar <mertduyar16@gmail.com>, 25 Tem 2025 Cum, 11:32 tarihinde şunu
yazdı:

> This is my cockpit. Will the plate fit this cockpit? And the brand I
> bought the cockpit from sells the same pallet for 50 euros. Is there any
> chance you can give me a little discount?
> [image: image.png]
>
> service@simsonn.com

Hi Mert Duyar,  If your cockpit base plate is adjustable, I believe the pedals can be fixed securely even without an additional plate. We’re unable to offer a further discount on the plate because it is heavy, which makes the shipping cost, especially for air freight, very high.

Okay, I'll try it, but this is what happened. It was working fine
yesterday. What's the problem?

Hi Mert Duyar,  Please release the upgrade button on the control box and reconnect the USB. This will exit the upgrade mode and switch the device back to normal operation mode.
